trans-unit.source: Create a Logic App with an API app
trans-unit.target: Create a Logic App with an API app

trans-unit.source: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy a Logic App and an API app.
trans-unit.target: Use an Azure Resource Manager template to deploy a Logic App and an API app.

trans-unit.source: Create a Logic App plus API app using a template
trans-unit.target: Create a Logic App plus API app using a template

trans-unit.source: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template to create a logic app with an App Service API app.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, you will learn how to create an Azure Resource Manager template to create a logic app with an App Service API app.

trans-unit.source: You can use the logic app to design workflows that articulate intent through a trigger and a
trans-unit.target: You can use the logic app to design workflows that articulate intent through a trigger and a

trans-unit.source: series of steps, each invoking the API app while securely taking care of authentication and best practices like durable execution.
trans-unit.target: series of steps, each invoking the API app while securely taking care of authentication and best practices like durable execution.

trans-unit.source: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and
trans-unit.target: You will learn how to define which resources are deployed and

trans-unit.source: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.
trans-unit.target: how to define parameters that are specified when the deployment is executed.

trans-unit.source: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.
trans-unit.target: You can use this template for your own deployments, or customize it to meet your requirements.

trans-unit.source: For more details on the logic app properties, see [Logic App Workflow Management API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn948513.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For more details on the logic app properties, see [Logic App Workflow Management API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn948513.aspx).

trans-unit.source: For examples of the definition itself, see [Author Logic App definitions](app-service-logic-author-definitions.md).
trans-unit.target: For examples of the definition itself, see [Author Logic App definitions](app-service-logic-author-definitions.md).

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating templates, see [Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information about creating templates, see [Authoring Azure Resource Manager Templates](../resource-group-authoring-templates.md).

trans-unit.source: For the complete template, see [Logic App with API app template](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/201-logic-app-api-app-create/azuredeploy.json).
trans-unit.target: For the complete template, see [Logic App with API app template](https://github.com/Azure/azure-quickstart-templates/blob/master/201-logic-app-api-app-create/azuredeploy.json).

trans-unit.target: App service plan

trans-unit.source: It uses the same location as the resource group to which it is being deployed.

trans-unit.target: Web app that hosts the gateway

trans-unit.target: Creates the web app to host the gateway.

trans-unit.source: Gateway
trans-unit.target: Gateway

trans-unit.source: Notice that the gateway includes a child resource for an authentication token.
trans-unit.target: Notice that the gateway includes a child resource for an authentication token.

trans-unit.source: This token is used by the Logic app to call into the gateway.
trans-unit.target: This token is used by the Logic app to call into the gateway.

trans-unit.source: A logic app requires a name, location, SKU (which points to that App service plan), definition, and, optionally, parameters.
trans-unit.target: A logic app requires a name, location, SKU (which points to that App service plan), definition, and, optionally, parameters.

trans-unit.source: Notice that the logic app uses the token to call the gateway.
trans-unit.target: Notice that the logic app uses the token to call the gateway.
